meanings.definition: The ordinal number corresponding to 30 in a series.
meanings.sent1: On the calendar, my birthday falls on the thirtieths day of the month.
meanings.sent2: She celebrated her thirtieths birthday with a big party.
meanings.sent3: At the thirtieths birthday party, the cake was shaped like the number 30.
meanings.sent4: The thirtieths guest to arrive at the party won a special prize.
meanings.sent5: In a year, there are twelve months, and the thirtieths day of each month is significant.

meanings.definition: A fraction equal to one divided by thirty.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for adding one thirtieths cup of sugar to the mixture.
meanings.sent2: She shared a thirtieths of her candy with her friend.
meanings.sent3: Eating just a thirtieths of the cake left him wanting more.
meanings.sent4: The thirtieths slice of pizza was the smallest one on the plate.
meanings.sent5: He only had a thirtieths of the total amount, so he needed to get more to have enough.
